title: Ayurveda & Anti-Aging (Secrets of Ayurveda and Chinese Medicine - Diet and Herbs for Anti Aging)
author: The Ayurveda Experience India
description: Ayurveda & Anti-Aging is a powerful, multi-disciplinary healing program that shows you how to plan your transitions from one stage of life to another in synergy with nature. Combining knowledge from Ayurveda, Chinese, and herbal medicine, this course is a composite approach to hitting the reset button on your life. Purchase this program now and get a free te-ext companion ANDinstant digital accessto the entire course (which means that you can watch the course online on your desktop, mobile, or tablet!) Not just this, also download your COMPLIMENTARY Course Completion Certificate After you complete watching the course, your Complimentary Course Completion Certificate awaits you. This can be easily downloaded and shared or printed.Free shipping + 10-day money back guarantee
